parameters.name: CenterPt_X
parameters.description: X coordinate of the center point

parameters.name: CenterPt_Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the center point

parameters.name: CenterPt_Z
parameters.description: Z coordinate of the center point

title: IRenderMaterial.SetCenterPoint2
description: Sets the center point of the mapping for texture-based appearances.
signature:
void SetCenterPoint2( 
   System.Double
CenterPt_X
,
   System.Double
CenterPt_Y
,
   System.Double
CenterPt_Z
)

parameters.name: CenterPt_X
parameters.description: X coordinate of the center point

parameters.name: CenterPt_Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the center point

parameters.name: CenterPt_Z
parameters.description: Z coordinate of the center point

remarks: This method is required to properly position a texture-based appearance (e.g., if you need a specific corner of a face to have the black square of a checkered-pattern appearance).
